body:
@basiliothecat re line 2230: Just keep in mind we have some imprecision in lots of places (for ease of reading) and we don't lose clarity. For instance, in map types ( https://golang.org/ref/spec#Map_types ) we talk about the "key type" not the underlying type of KeyType; etc.

Making this more precise everywhere does add bulk and makes the prose more uneven w/o really adding much clarity.
